info.title: Mobile Number Portability India Operator
info.description: This API will show the correct operator name and location details for Indian mobile number even after using MNP. This will be useful to recharge sites for to detect correct operator even if the customer has used mnp (Mobile Number Portability) facility. KEYWORDS:  mnp data, mnp details, mnp database, mnp database india, mnp data india, mnp trai data, mobile number portability

get.description: Find the mobile number info of MNP number in India.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: Enter the 10 digit Indian Mobile Number.
